TopicTitle: Fix for lionhead aerospace landers and probes pack.

Articles.Content:
Alright. The command pod parts are labelled incorrectly. In the beginning of the cfg, they are labelled as CommandModule when they should be labelled as Part. Do this for all of the pods aswell as the orbiters.

To fix the animations on the landers, scroll down in the cfg to the animation section and change the module to ModuleAnimateGeneric. That should fix most of the problems. Still figuring out how to fix parachutes. stay tuned.
